Articles.Content:
Welcome to the Douglas DC-6 introduction. 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/LodwU)

Features:

48 Passenger seats (expandable)

2 Pilot seats

1 Flight engineer seat

2 Flight attendant seats

2 Toilets

4 Doors

1 Cockpit door

1 Escape hatch 

2 Cargo doors

Dimensions are the same as the real thing.

Length: 33m

Width: 35m

Height: 9m

Top Speed: 128m/s (460km/h) @ 7000m. The real one has a cruise speed of 140m/s (507km/h).

Mass: 55t (a bit more than the real one)

Part count: 490

Required mods: [77 Industries - R2800 Supercharged Radial Engine](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/879/77%20Industries%20R-2800%20Supercharged%20Radial%20Engine)

and: [KAX](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/391/Kerbal%20Aircraft%20Expansion%20%28KAX%29)

Suggested mod: [Take Command](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/776/Take%20Command)

The plane does not have a probe core.

Suggestion: start the engines one by one (press action groups 1 to 4) with a few seconds in between. It will give a very rich sound!

Action group 5: cockpit door.

Action group 6: flaps.

Cargo doors, cabin doors and escape hatch don't work with action groups due to a bug in KSP 1.02.

The first seat is the flight engineer! Second and third are the pilot seats. I'm not going to place all 55 seats again due to one ordering mistake!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-02T21:41:44Z" title="06/02/2015 09:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 2, 2015</time> by Azimech**
Nice! I've been working on some Boeing Replicas but I only have two so far. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That looks awesome, Azimech! Repped!

Marvelous. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
